name: Rat Race!
description:
Controls: Left and right arrow keys to turn, up arrow to accelerate and back arrow to decelerate!

Rats! This thing (not really a game, but pretty close?) is about a rat with the power to move at crazy speeds, but also cursed to slide around everywhere! This was made in a couple hours after I got bored, I used the micro roguelike asset by Kenney, and I highly recommend it and all of their stuff!
